body: The error case will be signaled by `ReadNBytes()`, when the reading position is out of the range of file. With the original condition, it is possible to read a record containing some bytes of footer. Is this the expected behavior?
body_html: The error case will be signaled by ReadNBytes(), when the reading position is out of the range of file. With the original condition, it is possible to read a record containing some bytes of footer. Is this the expected behavior?
